value.name: Yahoo UK | News, email and search
value.description: Rishi Sunak has published his personal tax return, showing he paid more than half a million pounds in UK tax last year. More famous faces swap their day jobs for oven gloves in The Great Celebrity Bake Off 2024. Here's everything we know about it so far.

value.name: No 10 announces 13 new political life peers during recess
value.description: Thirteen new life peers have been announced by the Government. Downing Street published the list of political peerages on Friday as MPs were on holiday. The Tories’ eight nominations include Paul Goodman, a former Conservative MP and editor of the influential ConservativeHome website.

value.name: Sunak paid half a million pounds in tax last year, according to his tax returns
value.description: Rishi Sunak has published his personal tax return, showing he paid more than £500,000 in UK tax last year, as his total income rose to £2.2m. The summary of the prime minister's financial affairs was made public on Friday afternoon as parliament was in recess.

value.name: I’ll use whatever pronouns I think courteous
value.description: Even if her poor vulnerable child had not been murdered, this was no way for Rishi Sunak to speak. Navigating a political course between trans and women’s rights is delicate and serious, not the source of cheap zingers when you’re desperate for a win.

value.name: Rishi Sunak earned more than £2.2m last year
value.description: Rishi Sunak earned more than £2.2 million last year and paid an effective tax rate of 23 per cent, according to official accounts released on Friday. Downing Street published the Prime Minister’s tax return which showed that in total he paid just over £500,000 in UK taxes in 2022-23.

value.name: Tories and Labour both nominate political columnists to House of Lords
value.description: The Conservatives and Labour have both nominated political columnists to the House of Lords, as 13 new life peers were announced by the Government. Downing Street published the latest list of political peerages on Friday as MPs were on holiday.

value.name: Rishi Sunak: I’ll cut taxes to reward hard work
value.description: The prime minister is hitting the road as he gears up for the election — and putting economic competence at the heart of his campaign

value.name: Barrister removed from BA flight by armed cops after cabin crew row given peerage by PM
value.description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak slipped out the list of new peers on Friday evening that also includes a council leader who bragged about trying to kill moles with a blowtorch

value.name: Huge majority of UK's dentists think Rishi Sunak's Conservatives are harming the NHS
value.description: A pair of surveys questioning more than 3,000 dentists across the UK revealed that two-thirds of them now plan to go private – and a whopping 90% think Rishi Sunak's Conservative government is to blam

value.name: Rishi Sunak: Richmond campaign slams 6.3m NHS waiting list
value.description: Images projected on buildings in Rishi Sunak's North Yorkshire seat of Richmond have slammed the 6.3m NHS waiting list.

value.name: ‘Frustrated’ businesses seek staff abroad as Britons abandon work
value.description: Businesses have become “frustrated” with trying to hire British workers and are increasingly looking abroad to fill vacancies, the National Institute of Economic and Social Research (NIESR) has warned.

value.name: Will the UK go to war with Russia? Putin’s World War Three warning and other threats
value.description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak recently warned that ‘if Putin wins in Ukraine, he will not stop there’. ‘That is why Ukraine’s security is our security,’ he added. ‘NATO’ stands for North Atlantic Treaty Organisation. The group was formed in 1949 ...

value.name: Rishi Sunak makes £2 million as Britons struggle with cost of living crisis
value.description: Rishi Sunak’s income topped £2m last year as UK voters struggled with the cost of living crisis. The prime minister also paid more than half a million pounds in UK tax. Mr Sunak’s financial affairs have come under intense scrutiny since The Independent revealed his wife Akshata Murty held “non-dom” tax status to avoid UK tax on foreign income.

value.name: Rishi Sunak to appear as replacement for Jacob Rees-Mogg on GB News

value.name: Rishi Sunak Again Repeatedly Refuses To Apologise For Trans Joke
value.description: Rishi Sunak has again refused to apologise for making a joke about trans people after being told told the mother of murdered teenager Brianna Ghey was watching. In an interview with BBC Radio Somerset on Friday morning, the prime minster was repeatedly asked if he would say sorry.
